item.title: 智利 SQM 公司预计 2025 年锂需求将增长 25
item.description: 智利锂生产商SQM的高管周三表示，他们预计今年的锂需求将超过150万吨，比2024年增长25%。【原文：Executives from Chilean lithium producer SQM on Wednesday said they expect lithium demand this year to reach over 1.5 million metric tons, representing 25% growth from 2024.】

item.title: 施耐德电气与美国数据中心达成 23 亿美元交易，助力人工智能热潮
item.description: 施耐德电气（Schneider Electric）周三表示，该公司已与两家美国数据中心运营商签署了价值近 23 亿美元的新协议，因为人工智能的采用激增推动了对基础设施的需求。【原文：Schneider Electric said on Wednesday that it had signed new deals worth almost $2.3 billion with two U.S. data centre operators, as surging adoption of artificial intelligence boosts infrastructure demand.】

item.title: Blockfusion 将通过 4.5 亿美元的 SPAC 交易在纽约上市
item.description: 数据中心运营商 Blockfusion 周三表示，该公司将通过与空白支票公司 Blue Acquisition Corp 合并的方式在美国上市，交易价值为 4.5 亿美元，投资者对该行业的热情持续高涨。【原文：Data center operator Blockfusion said on Wednesday it would list in the United States through a merger with blank-check firm Blue Acquisition Corp in a deal valued at $450 million, as investor appetite for the sector continues to surge.】

item.title: 加密货币交易所 Kraken 秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 全球最大的加密货币交易所之一 Kraken 周三表示，它已秘密申请在美国首次公开募股，因为数字资产公司希望在 2026 年中期选举前开拓新的上市市场。【原文：Kraken, one of the world's largest cryptocurrency exchanges, said on Wednesday it has confidentially filed for an initial public offering in the U.S., as digital asset companies look to tap the new listings market before the 2026 midterm elections.】

item.title: 美联储主席米兰呼吁将国债豁免于银行杠杆率规则之外
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）周三呼吁监管机构将美国国债豁免于一项关键的银行杠杆比率，并认为监管机构应比之前提出的计划更进一步。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran on Wednesday called for regulators to exempt U.S. Treasury bonds from a key bank leverage ratio, arguing agencies should go further than previously proposed plans.】

item.title: 米兰称，放松监管可能导致美联储资产负债表规模缩小
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）周三表示，减轻金融公司的监管负担可能会让美国央行在未来再次缩减资产负债表的规模。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said on Wednesday that easing financial firms' regulatory burden could allow the U.S. central bank to shrink the size of its balance sheet again in the future.】

item.title: 美国能源部长称铀浓缩不是与沙特阿拉伯达成的民用核协议的一部分
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）周三表示，铀浓缩不是与沙特阿拉伯达成的民用核能协议的一部分。【原文：Uranium enrichment is not part of the deal on civil nuclear energy reached with Saudi Arabia, U.S. Energy Secretary Chris Wright said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国人口普查局将于下周发布 9 月份零售销售和耐用品订单报告
item.description: 美国商务部人口普查局周三表示，将于下周公布9月份零售销售、食品服务和耐用品订单报告。这两份报告都因政府关门而推迟发布。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department's Census Bureau said on Wednesday it would publish both September retail sales and food services and durable goods orders reports next week. Both were delayed by the government shutdown.】

item.title: 美国旅游业有望借助国际足联世界杯获得巨大成功
item.description: 2025 年，由于对唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易政策的不安以及对更严格的边境审查的担忧，游客们纷纷远离美国，而 2026 年国际足联世界杯的举办将为美国的国际旅游业带来急需的推动力。【原文：International tourism to the U.S. could get a much-needed boost from the 2026 FIFA World Cup after a sluggish 2025, when visitors stayed away amid unease over President Donald Trump's trade policies and concerns about tougher border scrutiny.】

item.title: 拉加经委会报告显示，尽管美国实行关税政策，拉丁美洲和加勒比地区之间的贸易仍将在 2025 年实现增长
item.description: 联合国拉丁美洲和加勒比经济委员会（拉加经委会）周三发布的一份报告显示，尽管美国对拉丁美洲和加勒比地区广泛征收关税，但其影响比最初预期的要弱，2025年该地区之间的贸易可能会增长。【原文：Trade between Latin America and the Caribbean will likely grow in 2025 despite broad U.S. tariffs across the region, which have had a weaker impact than initially expected, a report by UN's Economic Commission for Latin America and the Caribbean (ECLAC) revealed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普政府提名莱文巴赫为 CFPB 主任
item.description: 根据参议院收到的通知，美国政府已提名斯图尔特-莱文巴赫（Stuart Levenbach）担任消费者金融保护局局长，任期五年。【原文：The U.S. administration has nominated Stuart Levenbach to be director of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau for a five-year term, according to a notice provided to the Senate.】

item.title: 解说员：欧盟计划如何放宽对大科技公司的规定
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三公布了对欧洲数字规则手册的全面修改，批评人士称，这些修改将使大型科技公司更容易获取个人数据，并削弱实施了二十年的隐私保护措施。【原文：The European Commission on Wednesday unveiled sweeping changes to Europe's digital rulebook that critics say would give major technology companies easier access to personal data and weaken privacy protections in place for two decades.】

item.title: 大卫-贝克汉姆与美国银行签署体育合作协议
item.description: 前英格兰足球队队长大卫-贝克汉姆（David Beckham）与美国银行（Bank of America）签署了一项多年合作协议，在 2026 年北美世界杯足球赛之前推广全球体育项目。【原文：Former England soccer captain David Beckham signed a multi-year partnership with Bank of America to promote global sports programs ahead of the 2026 FIFA World Cup in North America, he and the bank said about the deal, which was first reported by Reuters.】

item.title: 美国、英国和澳大利亚宣布就勒索软件业务对总部位于俄罗斯的 Media Land 实施制裁
item.description: 美国、澳大利亚和英国周三宣布对总部位于俄罗斯的防弹托管服务提供商 Media Land 实施联合制裁，原因是该公司在支持勒索软件运营方面扮演了重要角色。【原文：The United States, Australia and the United Kingdom announced coordinated sanctions on Wednesday against Russia-based bulletproof hosting service provider Media Land for its role in supporting ransomware operations.】

item.title: 由于进口下降，美国 8 月贸易逆差大幅收窄
item.description: 由于进口下降，8 月份美国贸易赤字的收窄幅度超过预期，但贸易仍可能削弱第三季度的经济增长。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit narrowed more than expected in August as imports declined, but trade could still subtract from economic growth in the third quarter.】

item.title: MP 材料公司将与沙特阿拉伯矿业公司组建稀土提炼合资企业
item.description: MP Materials 公司周三表示，将与美国国防部和国有沙特阿拉伯矿业公司 (Maaden) 在沙特阿拉伯组建一家稀土精炼合资企业。【原文：MP Materials said on Wednesday it will form a rare-earth refining joint venture in Saudi Arabia with the U.S. Department of War and the state-owned Saudi Arabian Mining Company (Maaden).】

item.title: 法国政府表示，欧盟与南方共同市场的贸易协议仍需努力才能为法国所接受
item.description: 法国政府发言人周三表示，法国仍无法接受欧盟与南美贸易集团南方共同市场（Mercosur）谈判达成的贸易协议的现有形式。【原文：A trade deal negotiated between the European Union and the South American trade bloc Mercosur is still not acceptable for France in its current form, a French government spokesperson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 梯瓦寻求初创企业帮助解决全球制药难题
item.description: 梯瓦制药工业公司（Teva Pharmaceutical Industries）周三表示，该公司正在呼吁初创企业加入其新平台，以开发应对梯瓦和全球制药业所面临的一系列挑战的技术。【原文：Teva Pharmaceutical Industries said on Wednesday it was calling on startups to join its new platform to develop technologies to deal with a host of challenges facing Teva and the global pharmaceuticals industry.】

item.title: Meta 将在 12 月 10 日前屏蔽澳大利亚青少年的 Facebook 和 Instagram
item.description: Meta 公司周四表示，将在 12 月 10 日前阻止 16 岁以下的澳大利亚用户访问 Instagram、Facebook 和 Threads，以遵守该国针对青少年的全面社交媒体禁令。【原文：Meta will block Australian users under 16 from accessing Instagram, Facebook and Threads by December 10 to comply with the country’s sweeping social media ban for teenagers, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 英伟达与 Menlo Micro 合作加速人工智能芯片测试
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）和Menlo Micro公司周三表示，他们已利用这家初创公司的技术大幅加快了人工智能芯片的测试速度，缓解了生产上的一个重大瓶颈。【原文：Nvidia and Menlo Micro on Wednesday said they have used technology from the startup to dramatically speed up the testing of AI chips, easing a significant production bottleneck.】

item.title: G20 金融监督机构支持监管现代化
item.description: 全球金融监管机构周三表示，明年的首要任务是实现监管现代化、调整有关稳定币的规则以及监控不断膨胀的债务和私人信贷市场。【原文：Modernising regulations, aligning rules around stablecoins and keeping tabs on ballooning debt and private credit markets are next year's top priorities, global financial regulators said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国将在未来几天内降低对瑞士的关税
item.description: 瑞士政府在上周达成初步协议后表示，美国和瑞士正在努力争取在未来几天内将美国对瑞士的关税从39%降至15%。【原文：The United States and Switzerland are working towards implementing a reduction in U.S. tariffs on Switzerland to 15% from 39% in the coming days, the Swiss government said after it sealed an initial deal last week.】

item.title: 在大科技公司的反对下，欧盟将把 "高风险 "人工智能规则推迟到 2027 年实施
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三提议精简和放宽一系列科技法规，包括推迟实施《人工智能法案》的部分条款，以减少繁文缛节，抵制大科技公司的批评，提高欧洲的竞争力。【原文：The European Commission proposed on Wednesday streamlining and easing a slew of tech regulations, including delaying some provisions of its AI Act, in an attempt to cut red tape, head off criticism from Big Tech and boost Europe's competitiveness.】

item.title: TJ Maxx 母公司 TJX 上调年度利润预期
item.description: TJX Cos 周三上调了年度利润预期，预计广泛的采购策略和季节性库存将吸引追求低价的购物者光顾其非价格商店。【原文：TJX Cos raised annual profit forecast on Wednesday, anticipating that broad sourcing strategy and seasonal inventory will attract bargain-hunting shoppers to its off-price stores.】

item.title: Adobe 将以 19 亿美元收购软件供应商 Semrush
item.description: Photoshop 制造商 Adobe 公司周三表示，将以 19 亿美元的价格收购软件平台 Semrush。【原文：Photoshop maker Adobe will acquire software platform Semrush in a $1.9 billion deal, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴西贷款机构 BRB 将聘请审计公司调查与 Banco Master 有关的事实
item.description: 巴西国有银行巴西商业银行（BRB）周三表示，其董事会决定聘请一家专门的外部审计公司，对针对中型贷款机构 Banco Master 的警方行动的相关事实进行调查。【原文：Brazilian state-run bank BRB said on Wednesday that its board decided to hire a specialized external audit firm to investigate the facts related to a police operation which targeted mid-sized lender Banco Master.】

item.title: 投资者从贝莱德旗舰产品比特币 ETF 撤回创纪录的 5.23 亿美元资金
item.description: 根据 Farside Investors 的数据，周二投资者从贝莱德的旗舰产品 iShares 比特币信托基金中撤资约 5.23 亿美元，创下该基金自推出以来的最大单日撤资纪录。【原文：Investors pulled roughly $523 million from BlackRock's flagship iShares Bitcoin Trust on Tuesday, according to data from Farside Investors, marking the fund's largest single-day withdrawal since its launch.】

item.title: 拉里-萨默斯在爱泼斯坦邮件事件后辞去 OpenAI 董事会职务
item.description: 美国前财政部长、哈佛大学前校长拉里-萨默斯（Larry Summers）周一表示，他将退出所有公共事务，并补充说此举是为了让他 "重建信任，修复与我最亲近的人之间的关系"。【原文：Former U.S. Treasury Secretary Larry Summers, also a former president of Harvard University, said on Monday he would step back from all public commitments, adding that the move was to allow him "to rebuild trust and repair relationships with the people closest to me."】

item.title: 早间新闻英伟达暂停技术溃退，日本受到冲击
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 塔吉特季度销售额降幅大于预期，为关键节假日做准备
item.description: 塔吉特周三公布的季度可比销售额降幅大于预期，原因是资金紧张的美国消费者减少了在服装和家居装饰上的自由支配支出。【原文：Target on Wednesday reported a bigger-than-expected drop in quarterly comparable sales as cash-strapped U.S. consumers pulled back discretionary spending on apparel and home decor.】
